name: Hoppers (Appa)
description: Bowl-shaped fermented rice pancakes with crispy edges
instructions: Mix yeast with warm water and sugar, let sit 10 minutes
Add yeast mixture and coconut milk
Pour batter and swirl to form bowl shape
Cover and cook until edges are crispy
cultural_notes: Often served with egg in the center for egg hoppers
description_sinhala: හැපෙනසුළු දාර සහිත බඳුනක හැඩැති පැසුණු සහල් පෑන්කේක්
description_tamil: மிருதுவான விளிம்புகளுடன் கிண்ண வடிவ புளித்த அரிசி அப்பங்கள்
cultural_notes_sinhala: බොහෝ විට බිත්තර ආප්ප සඳහා මධ්‍යයේ බිත්තරයක් සමඟ සේවය කරයි
cultural_notes_tamil: முட்டை ஹாப்பர்களுக்கு மையத்தில் முட்டையுடன் அடிக்கடி பரிமாறப்படுகிறது
